Entry.JapaneseText: あ……小屋があるよ。 ひと休みしていこうよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, there's a hostel up ahead. Let's rest there.

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなヒマはない。 こうしてる間にもクレアは……
Entry.EnglishText: We don't have time for that. As we speak, Claire is...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、気持ちはわかるが、 休む場所がある時に休んでおいたほうがいい。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>, I understand how you feel, but when you have a place to rest, it's best to do so.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうそう。この先に、旅人用の小屋が あるとは限らないしね。
Entry.EnglishText: Yep yep. We can't be sure if we're going to come across anymore hostels for travelers from here on out.
Entry.Notes: hopefully this fits. we wil see.
